title: caught a neighbor stealing lemons from my yard - the police didn't care.
body:
he noticed me, stopped and asked if he could pick a few Lemons. I got so pissed off I called the cops, but the assholes laughed, asked if I have anything else to report, and just hang up the phone. the fence isn't high enough because the trees are tall, and making them any higher is probably against the law.

what am I supposed to do?, if the cops won't help all is left is beat the crap out of him, and then he calls the cops and they will probably arrest me. what good is the police if that's how it works?. isn't that actually stealing from my property?, can't I sue him or something?. Hell that might cost me more money than it's worth..
